snippet: The 120-nation Nonaligned Movement unanimously decreed support for Iran’s disputed nuclear program, but the group’s final communiqué omitted any mention of support for Syria.
abstract: Final result of the 120-nation Nonaligned Movement’s meeting amounts to strong expression of support for Iran’s nuclear energy program, while omitting any mention of support for Syria.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The 120-nation Nonaligned Movement unanimously decreed support for Iran’s disputed nuclear program, but the group’s final communiqué omitted any mention of support for Syria.

headline.seo: Nonaligned Nations Back Iran on Nuclear Bid, but Not on Syria
headline.main: Nonaligned Nations Back Iran’s Nuclear Bid, but Not Syria
headline.print_headline: Nonaligned Nations Back Iran on Nuclear Power, but Not on Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
